response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique and highly valuable product. This item holds immense significance to me, but I am confident it could also bring unparalleled benefits to you. I am offering you the chance to purchase this product for $750,000. This price reflects its true worth and my desire to find it a new owner who will appreciate its value as much as I have. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer. I am looking forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 750000}
